title: 2 bed 1.5 bath ready to view now! Visit Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes today!
neighborhood: 25 Minute Drive to Newman Wetlands Center
posting_body: ['Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 1.5', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1028 sq ft', 'Rent: Please call', 'Terms: 6-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'We offer 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes that offer large floor plans, and each unit has a private patio or balconies.', 'In addition, Emerald Pointe is only minutes away from downtown Atlanta, so you will always have easy access to various restaurants and shops!', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '− Dishwasher', '− Frost-Free Refrigerator', '− Range', '− Tub/Shower', '− Wall to Wall Carpeting', '− Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '− Eat-in Kitchen', '− Private Patio or Balcony', '− Vinyl Flooring', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Washer/Dryer Hookup', '− Window Coverings', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '− 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '− Controlled Access', '− Grill', '− Maintenance on site', '− Online Services', '− On-Site Management', '− Playground', '− Sparkling Swimming Pool', '− Sun Deck', '− Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '− Clothes Care Center/Laundry Facilities', '− Convenient Online Rental Payments', '− Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '− Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '− Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '− Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '− Monthly Pest Control', '− Package Service', '− Resident Referral Program', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '501 Roberts Dr', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions 25lbs.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '619E1DC5B7734938']
